r.s: Port of the core RAP API
r.d: This package is a port of the core components of the RDF API for PHP (aka RAP): http://www.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de/suhl/bizer/rdfapi/.
r.n: - fixed bug #3031 (Cannot re-assign this) - cosmetic fixes - propagate PEAR errors to the user]* QA release Bug #17784 Avoid ereg
